DOC.brief_summary: To investigate clinical safety effectiveness donepezil hydrochloride administration patient mild moderate Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Surveillance Donepezil Hydrochloride -Investigation Clinical Safety Effectiveness Patients With Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion ; Patients diagnose Alzheimer 's Disease Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders ( DSMIV ) . Patients diagnose mild moderate Alzheimer 's Disease , applicable Functional Assessment Staging ( FAST ) score 4 5 . Exclusion criterion ; Patients use Aricept within 3 month prior dose . Patients register survey . Patients history hypersensitivity ingredient Aricept piperidine derivative .
